channel.title: Pompeii the community driven rsps
channel.description:
[CENTER][IMG]http://pompeii-ps.com/forums/public/style_images/4_vbulletin4_logo.png[/img]
[size=40pt][URL=http://"http://pompeii-ps.com/"]Home[/URL] || [URL=http://"http://pompeii-ps.com/play/"]Play Now![/URL] || [url=http://pompeii-ps.com/forums/]Forums[/url] || [URL=http://"http://pompeii-ps.com/vote/"]Vote[/URL][/size]
[SPOILER=About us][SIZE=3][FONT=Comic Sans MS]Pompeii is a RuneScape private server that is based on a 317 revision. What makes Pompeii so popular is the current available graphics and revision. Currently we're loading most 614 data. Pompeii is an economic based server that many people enjoy to play because of the invigorating experience. We offer great combat, custom quests, 23 skills, 4+ custom built minigames, and over 15,000 npc spawns![/FONT][/SIZE][/SPOILER]
[SPOILER=Features] [LEFT]
[ul][*]Achievements [*]3 donor ranks [*]Player titles [*]4 quests [*]Prestiging [*]8 different training places - Minigames [*]Duel arena [*]Warriors guild [*]Pest control (full) [*]Dungeoneering with 20 different maps and 5 bosses [*]Barrows [*]Fight cave / kiln [*]Fight pits [*]Castle wars - Bosses [*]KBD [*]Corp beast [*]Tormented demons [*]God wars [*]Bork [*]Dag kings [*]Desert Strykeworms [*]Frost drags [*]Kalphite king [*]balance elemental [*]Sea troll queen [*]12 different skilling zones [*]28 different towns to teleport to [*]Very good combat [*]lottery [*]Bank tabs [*]17 functioning skills not inclding combat [*]Sounds and music [*]Fullscreen, resizable [*]HD, SD -Custom minigames [*]Scavhunt [*]Zombies [*]Assault race [*]Random events [*]Player owned shops [*]Full clipping [*]Pets [*]Summoning [*]Clanchat [*]Cluescrolls[/ul]
[/LEFT] [/SPOILER]
[SPOILER=Media] [IMG]http://i58.tinypic.com/246jerl.png[/img] [IMG]http://i59.tinypic.com/2qtbhj7.png[/img] [IMG]http://i61.tinypic.com/hvtrep.png[/img] [IMG]http://i61.tinypic.com/122yr8h.png[/img] [IMG]http://i61.tinypic.com/28jjkgz.png[/img] [IMG]http://i60.tinypic.com/2cymhw1.png[/img] [IMG]http://i58.tinypic.com/jpdgdw.png[/img] [IMG]http://i61.tinypic.com/25r01s0.png[/img] [IMG]http://i59.tinypic.com/1109ldu.png[/img] [IMG]http://i57.tinypic.com/vewv87.png[/img] [IMG]http://i60.tinypic.com/mai1b7.png[/img] [IMG]http://i58.tinypic.com/288xva0.png[/img] [/SPOILER]
[/CENTER]

[SPOILER=About us][SIZE=3][FONT=Comic Sans MS]Pompeii is a RuneScape private server that is based on a 317 revision. What makes Pompeii so popular is the current available graphics and revision. Currently we’re loading most 614 data. Pompeii is an economic based server that many people enjoy to play because of the invigorating experience. We offer great combat, custom quests, 23 skills, 4+ custom built minigames, and over 15,000 npc spawns![/FONT][/SIZE][/SPOILER]

[SPOILER=Features]

[]Prestiging
